items.label: equalsIgnoreCase(anotherString)
items.documentation: Compares two strings, ignoring the case of the strings.

items.label: toUpper()
items.documentation: Returns a string with all the characters converted to uppercase.

items.label: substring(startIndex,endIndex)
items.documentation: Returns a new string that is the substring of the specified string.

items.label: lastIndexOf(substring)
items.documentation: Returns the first index of the last occurence of the substring within the specified string.

items.label: replaceFirst(regex,replaceWith)
items.documentation: Replaces the first instance of the replacePattern with the replaceWith string and returns the result.

items.label: length()
items.documentation: Returns the length of the specified string.

items.label: contains(substring)
items.documentation: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether a string contains the specified substring.

items.label: indexOf(substring)
items.documentation: Returns the first index of the first occurence of the substring within the specified string.

items.label: trim()
items.documentation: Returns a trimmed string by omitting the leading and trailing whitespaces of the original string.

items.label: hasSuffix(suffix)
items.documentation: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the string ends with specified suffix.

items.label: unescape()
items.documentation: Returns an unescaped string by omitting the escape characters of the original string.

items.label: toLower()
items.documentation: Returns a string with all the characters converted to lowercase.

items.label: hasPrefix(prefix)
items.documentation: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether a string starts with the specified prefix.

items.label: replaceAll(regex,replaceWith)
items.documentation: Replaces each substring of the string that matches the given regular expression with the given replacement.

items.label: replace(regex,replaceWith)
items.documentation: Replaces all instances of the replacePattern string with the replaceWith string and returns the result.

items.label: split(regex)
items.documentation: Splits the string with the given regular expression to produce a string array.

items.label: findAll(regex)
items.documentation: Finds all the strings matching the regular expression.

items.label: matches(regex)
items.documentation: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the string matches the regular expression.

items.label: base64Encode(charset)
items.documentation: Encode a given string with Base64 encoding scheme.

items.label: base64Decode(charset)
items.documentation: Decode a given string with Base64 encoding scheme.

items.label: base16ToBase64Encode()
items.documentation: Encodes a base16 encoded string to base64 encoding.

items.label: base64ToBase16Encode()
items.documentation: Encodes a base64 encoded string to base16 encoding.

items.label: toByteArray(encoding)
items.documentation: Converts string to a byte array.
